name: Camera One
tagline: Camera One is an Open Source modular camera system designed for still photography. The idea behind this camera is to make a truly customizable experience, one where you can build the camera for the photograph, not the other way around.
body:
# Camera-One

Camera One is an Open Source Modular Camera System designed for still photography. The idea behind this camera is to make a truly customizable experience, one where you can build the camera for the photograph, not the other way around.

Currently this project is being developed in Solidworks using STereoLithography files for Github support and feature tracking, as well as 3D Manufacturing Format to allow support for easy manufacturing.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
